name: simple flower coasters
designer_name: danyel pink for oombawka design crochet
notes:
brighten up your home or special event with this easy and quick to make crochet flower coaster set. 

this free crochet pattern is easy and quick to make, only requiring a small amount of yarn. it is the perfect scrapbuster project and you can make two coasters in 10 minutes.

+[media title][1]

this pattern was originally designed by danyel pink. it is now available exclusively at oombawka design crochet.

> danyel pink has sold the full
